verses.verse: And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about in the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> on the <S%H2568>fifth<s%> [day] of the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> as I was <S%H3427>sitting<s%> in my <S%H1004>house<s%> with the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H3427>sitting<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me, that the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on me <S%H8033>there.<s%>

Then I <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> a <S%H1823>likeness<s%> as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of a <S%H784>man;<s%> from His <S%H4975>loins<s%> and <S%H4295>downward<s%> [there was] the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H784>fire,<s%> and from His <S%H4975>loins<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H2096>brightness,<s%> like the <S%H5869>appearance<s%> of <S%H2830>glowing<s%> <S%H2830>metal.<s%>

And He <S%H7971>stretched<s%> out the <S%H8403>form<s%> of a <S%H3027>hand<s%> and <S%H3947>caught<s%> me by a <S%H6734>lock<s%> of my <S%H7218>head;<s%> and the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> <S%H5375>lifted<s%> me up <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H776>earth<s%> and <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> me in the <S%H4759>visions<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> to the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> [court,] <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H4186>seat<s%> of the <S%H5566>idol<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H7065>provokes<s%> to <S%H7065>jealousy,<s%> was [located.]

And <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> [was] <S%H8033>there,<s%> like the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> in the <S%H1237>plain.<s%>

Then He <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5375>raise<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6828>north.<s%>" So I <S%H5375>raised<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> to the <S%H6828>north<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> [was] <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5566>idol<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> at the <S%H872>entrance.<s%>

And He <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> you <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> they are <S%H6213>doing,<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8441>abominations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are <S%H6213>committing<s%> <S%H6311>here,<s%> that I should be <S%H7368>far<s%> from My <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>? But <S%H5750>yet<s%> you will <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H7725>still<s%> <S%H1419>greater<s%> <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>"
Then He <S%H935>brought<s%> me to the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H2691>court,<s%> and when I <S%H7200>looked,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> a <S%H2356>hole<s%> in the <S%H7023>wall.<s%>

And He <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H2864>dig<s%> through the <S%H7023>wall.<s%>" So I <S%H2864>dug<s%> through the <S%H7023>wall,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> an <S%H6607>entrance.<s%>
And He <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H935>"Go<s%> in and <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H8441>abominations<s%> that they are <S%H6213>committing<s%> <S%H6311>here.<s%>"

So I <S%H935>entered<s%> and <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H8403>form<s%> of <S%H7431>creeping<s%> <S%H7431>things<s%> and <S%H929>beasts<s%> [and] <S%H8263>detestable<s%> <S%H8263>things,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1544>idols<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> were <S%H2707>carved<s%> on the <S%H7023>wall<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around.<s%>

And <S%H5975>standing<s%> in <S%H6440>front<s%> of them were <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> with <S%H2970>Jaazaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them, <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> with his <S%H4730>censer<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and the <S%H6282>fragrance<s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> of <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H5927>rising.<s%>

Then He <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> do you <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are <S%H6213>committing<s%> in the <S%H2822>dark,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> in the <S%H2315>room<s%> of his <S%H4906>carved<s%> <S%H4906>images<s%>? For they <S%H559>say,<s%> 'The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> does not <S%H7200>see<s%> us; the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>'"
And He <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H5750>"Yet<s%> you will <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H7725>still<s%> <S%H1419>greater<s%> <S%H8441>abominations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they are <S%H6213>committing.<s%>"

Then He <S%H935>brought<s%> me to the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the Lord's <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> [was] <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H6828>north;<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> were <S%H3427>sitting<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H1058>weeping<s%> for <S%H8542>Tammuz.<s%>

And He <S%H559>said<s%> to me, "Do you <S%H7200>see<s%> [this,] <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>? <S%H5750>Yet<s%> you will <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H7725>still<s%> <S%H1419>greater<s%> <S%H8441>abominations<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H428>these.<s%>"

Then He <S%H935>brought<s%> me into the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%> And <S%H2009>behold,<s%> at the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> to the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H197>porch<s%> and the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> [were] about twenty-five <S%H376>men<s%> with their <S%H268>backs<s%> to the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the Lord and their <S%H6440>faces<s%> toward the <S%H9506>east;<s%> and they were <S%H7812>prostrating<s%> themselves <S%H9506>eastward<s%> toward the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>

And He <S%H559>said<s%> to me, "Do you <S%H7200>see<s%> [this,] <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>? Is it too <S%H7043>light<s%> a <S%H7043>thing<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> to <S%H6213>commit<s%> the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H6311>here,<s%> that they have <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> with <S%H2555>violence<s%> and <S%H3707>provoked<s%> Me <S%H7725>repeatedly<s%>? For <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they are <S%H7971>putting<s%> the <S%H2156>twig<s%> to their <S%H639>nose.<s%>

"Therefore, I <S%H1571>indeed<s%> shall <S%H6213>deal<s%> in <S%H2534>wrath.<s%> My <S%H5869>eye<s%> will <S%H2347>have<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2347>pity<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> shall I <S%H2550>spare;<s%> and though they <S%H7121>cry<s%> in My <S%H241>ears<s%> with a <S%H1419>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice,<s%> yet I shall not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to them."
